title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing the report, the default values for the parameters are not displayed in the Show Report Parameters dialog.
OB: After previewing the report, I clicked on the Show Report Parameters button.
EB: The default values for the parameters should be shown in the value boxes in the Show Report Parameters dialog. This would allow me to easily modify the parameter that I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Preview the report. 
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button. 
3. Verify that the default values for the parameters are not displayed in the value boxes.
